title.narrative: Programm Rural Microfinance in Latin America (Paraguay, Peru, Kolumbien)
Programm Rural Microfinance in Latin America (Paraguay, Peru, Kolumbien)

description.narrative: Oberziel: To improve access and control of financial resources for women and to pro-mote gender equality with a specific emphasis on rural women’s economic empower-ment. Ziel von Komponente 1 "Design and deliver rural credit products: Tailored rural credit products and services developed or refined and implemented".
